text: Le Brio is a 2017 French comedy film directed by Yvan Attal. ==Plot== Neïla lives in the Paris suburbs with her mother and grandmother. She enrolls herself into Panthéon-Assas University in the hopes of becoming a lawyer, but meets with public humiliation tainted with racism from her controversial professor when she arrives late. The President of the school catches wind of the incident and steps in, only to task the professor, as a means to make amends, to mentor Neïla for an upcoming speech contest. ==Cast== * Daniel Auteuil as Pierre Mazard * Camélia Jordana as Neïla Salah * Yasin Houicha as Mounir * Nozha Khouadra as la mère de Neïla * Nicolas Vaude as le Président de Paris II-Panthéon Assas * Jean-Baptiste Lafarge as Benjamin * Claude Perron as la femme au chien * Virgil Leclaire as Keufran * Zohra Benali as la grand-mère de Neïla * Damien Zanoly as Jean Proutot * Jean-Philippe Puymartin as le président des concours * Paulette Joly as Madame Mazard ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:French films Category:French-language films Category:2017 comedy films Category:Films directed by Yvan Attal Category:French comedy films Category:Pathé films
title: Le Brio
